Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/nettle/nettle-3.9.1.tar.gz
ğŸš echo ccfeff981b0ca71bbd6fbcb054f407c60ffb644389a5be80d6716d5b550c6ce3  nettle-3.9.1.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf nettle-3.9.1.tar.gz
ğŸš cd nettle-3.9.1
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/nettle-3.9.1 --disable-static
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš sudo chmod +x /opt/package/nettle-3.9.1/lib/libhogweed.so.6.8
ğŸš sudo chmod +x /opt/package/nettle-3.9.1/lib/libnettle.so.8.8
ğŸš rm -rf
